sentence: You have, in Georgia, Brian Kemp, the Republican who was number one on Donald Trump's enemy list -- he hated him so much he said he'd support Stacey Abrams -- Kemp is humiliating his conspiracy opponent, David Perdue, right now, his pro-trump opponent."

title: 'QAnon freaks and lunatic fringe': Morning Joe panel goes off on 'crazy' Republicans

sentence: Back on April 2nd, 2020, she tweeted "Reminder Brian Kemp stole the gubernatorial election from Georgians and Stacey Abrams."
